languages.text: [Поддаться наваждению] "Каюсь пред трибуналом и Богом-Императором — повин{mf|ен|а} во всех обвинениях!"

traits.locale_text: "Каюсь пред трибуналом и Богом-Императором — повин{mf|ен|а} во всех обвинениях!"

languages.text: [Submit to the illusion] "Before the court and the God-Emperor Himself, I plead guilty to all charges."
languages.original_text: [Поддаться наваждению] "Каюсь пред трибуналом и Богом-Императором — повин{mf|ен|а} во всех обвинениях!"

traits.locale_text: "I plead guilty to all charges before the court and God-Emperor himself."

languages.text: [Se soumettre à l'illusion] « Je plaide coupable de tous les chefs d'accusation devant le tribunal et l'Empereur-Dieu lui-même. »
languages.original_text: [Submit to the illusion] "Before the court and the God-Emperor Himself, I plead guilty to all charges."

traits.locale_text: [Se soumettre à l'illusion] « Je plaide coupable de tous les chefs d'accusation devant le tribunal et l'Empereur-Dieu lui-même. »

languages.text: [顺从幻觉的摆布]“我在此法庭与神皇面前承认所有指控。”
languages.original_text: [Submit to the illusion] "Before the court and the God-Emperor Himself, I plead guilty to all charges."

traits.locale_text: [顺从幻觉的摆布]“我在此法庭与神皇面前承认所有指控。”

languages.text: ［幻影に従う］「本法廷と神帝陛下の前で、すべての罪を認める」
languages.original_text: [Submit to the illusion] "Before the court and the God-Emperor Himself, I plead guilty to all charges."

traits.locale_text: ［幻影に従う］「本法廷と神帝陛下の前で、すべての罪を認める」

languages.text: [Der Illusion nachgeben] "Ich bekenne mich vor dem Gericht und dem Gottimperator selbst schuldig in allen Anklagepunkten."
languages.original_text: [Submit to the illusion] "Before the court and the God-Emperor Himself, I plead guilty to all charges."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bekenne mich vor dem Hof und dem Imperator selbst schuldig in allen Punkten."

languages.text: [Someterte a la ilusión] «Me declaro culpable de todos los cargos ante este tribunal y ante el mismísimo Dios Emperador».
languages.original_text: [Submit to the illusion] "Before the court and the God-Emperor Himself, I plead guilty to all charges."

traits.locale_text: [Someterte a la ilusión] «Me declaro culpable de todos los cargos ante este tribunal y ante el mismísimo Dios Emperador».

languages.text: [İllüzyona boyun eğ] "Divan ve Tanrı İmparator Hazretleri'nin önünde tüm suçlamaları kabul ediyorum."
languages.original_text: [Submit to the illusion] "Before the court and the God-Emperor Himself, I plead guilty to all charges."

traits.locale_text: [İllüzyona boyun eğ] "Divanın ve Tanrı İmparator'un kendisinin önünde, tüm suçlamaları kabul ediyorum."
